segments.text: I glance at the kitchen and freeze, the sink is actually overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading over the edge, I had no idea it was that bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, drying her plate, completely zoned out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and all, standing in the mess without a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then I see the boy on the stool, reaching way up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whoa, that thing's tipping, he's about to topple!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies in the jar, and he's grabbing them like a pro thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's involved too, hand up waiting her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a quiet garden, such a contrast to this surprise inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming fast, dishes waiting, everything's unexpected.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool's legs are splayed out unevenly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene caught me off guard, from calm to calamity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The curtains back, light pouring in on the hidden dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR
